channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Mac Mini… quels sont les meilleurs MacBook et Mac de bureau en 2025 ?
item.description: Il existe plusieurs gammes d'ordinateurs Apple : MacBook, iMac, Mac Studio. Vous ne savez pas quel Mac choisir ? On fait le point pour vous aider à choisir le meilleur MacBook (ou bien le Mac fixe) qui vous convient le mieux.

item.title: ‘There are really two elements that we looked to improve with this game’: we talk all things Nioh 3 with the game’s producers
item.description: TRG sits down with Team Ninja producers Kohei Shibata and Fumihiko Yasuda to discuss all things Nioh 3.

item.title: I needed a small NAS for my studio office, and the TerraMaster F2-425 NAS impressed me with size and power
item.description: The TerraMaster F2-425 is a two-bay NAS ideal for SMB and creatives looking for a fast and reliable backup and storage solution for the office or studio.

item.title: Samsung may have leaked the Galaxy S26 design through One UI 8.5 – and another Exynos 2600 rumor has emerged
item.description: We may now know more about what the Samsung Galaxy S26 phones look like, and how they'll be powered.

item.title: A New ‘Fallout’ Season 2 Clip Tries For a Speech Check
item.description: Looks like there's more of 'Fallout: New Vegas' in the show than just the titular town, including at least one other fan-favorite location.

item.title: Meta plans to push back the debut of its next mixed reality glasses to 2027
item.description: The big reveal for Meta's next mixed reality glasses is being postponed until the first half of 2027, according to a report from Business Insider. Based on an internal memo from Maher Saba, the vice president of Meta's Reality Labs Foundation, the report said that the company's project, which is codenamed "Phoenix," will no longer be scheduled for a 2026 debut. In a separate memo, Meta execs explained that the delay would help deliver a more "polished and reliable experience." According to BI, a memo from Meta's Gabriel Aul and Ryan Cairns said this new release window is "going to give us a lo...

item.title: Test de la Lenovo Idea Tab Plus, l’idée cadeau pour un étudiant ?
item.description: Lenovo présente l'Idea Tab Plus, la dernière tablette d'entrée de gamme de la marque, à destination notamment des étudiants. Le but est d'attaquer de front les marques de renom sur ce marché, en faisant un pas de côté, pour proposer une formule différente. Des accessoires au logiciel, on ressent une volonté de productivité plutôt que d'en faire trop pour rien. Reste à voir ce que cela donne sur le banc d'essai. ...

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 and Ninja’s Creami are the best deals of the week
item.description: Cyber week has just about wrapped up, but there are still some amazing Cyber Monday leftovers that you can save money on. The one deal we can’t stop telling readers about is the unexpected $50 discount on Nintendo’s Switch 2 console bundle that includes Mario Kart World, bringing it down to $449.99 (was $499.99). Currently, […]

item.title: Creator IShowSpeed sued for allegedly punching, choking viral humanoid Rizzbot
item.description: Creator IShowSpeed sued after punching, choking viral humanoid Rizzbot.

item.title: This super-compact budget desktop amp/DAC can replace a mini hi-fi stack, and it's perfect for budding audiophiles
item.description: Schitt updates its modular Magni Unity with a new DAC card, perfect for Hi-Res Audio thrills from sensitive wired headphones

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi une caméra 360° Insta360 X4 Air
item.description: Pour le sixième jour du calendrier de l'Avent #FrandroidOffreMoi, tentez de gagner une caméra Insta360 X4 Air !
